summary: Allows Bound weapons to ignore armor with the right perks and allows to build Ghost weapons
descriptionHtml:
(this mod is still a work in progress)

This mod changes the Mystic Binding perk to allow bound and etheric (drainblood axe, ghost blade ECT) weapon to ignore 15% of the targets armor rating. It also changes Oblivion Binding to allow bound weapons to ignore an addition 15% of the targets armor rating

aside from these changes you can now forge ghostly weapons from ectoplasm/glowdust/wisp wrappings and if you have a black soul gem you can make the ultimate in ghostly weapons the Etheric Blade

And finally the ghost blade has been buffed slightly now doing 5 points of unblock-able damage and absorbing 5 hp per hit

the original effects of these perks are still there btw

All added keywords are in the Extra Keywords.esm for modularity and moddability

-Update-

1.4 - fixed some of the enchantments on the drain weapons from single use to multi use

!!!!ATTENTION!!!!

All updates will be on the workshop - http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1407368
